name: Downtown Nekketsu Dodgeball
overview: (Google Translated from the official Japanese WiiWare listing) "Downtown Nekketsu Dodgeball" is a slightly different "fighting type dodge ball" that the development staff of the downtown series delivers, as much as possible, bouncing balls. Dedicated AI is installed for character rich characters familiar in the downtown series. Take fine actions according to the situation of fellows and games and make the game excitement. Customize team by gathering members. Tuning AI by strategy change to watch COM, leave it to you, leave my-way mode and more. Balance of rules, actions and status is renewed, so you can enjoy from beginners to advanced people. The operation is simple and sensuous. Let's unleashed shots and collaborative play!
